title: Hoshi No Kirby - Dedede De Pupupu Na Monogatari
alternative_title: 星のカービィ―デデデでプププなものがたり ; Kirby of the Stars: The Legend of King Dedede in Dream Land ; Kirby's Adventure ; Kirby's Adventure - with King Dedede in Dream Land
status: 星のカービィ―デデデでプププなものがたり ; Kirby of the Stars: The Legend of King Dedede in Dream Land ; Kirby's Adventure ; Kirby's Adventure - with King Dedede in Dream Land
description:
Description :
        Kirby, alongside his mentor "Bitty" go up against King Dedede and his underling "Poppy" as they repeatedly attempt to steal Dream Land's fabled treasure, the Star Rod.

chapters.chapter_name: Chapter 2: Kirby Vs King Dedede, A Race To The Top!!
Vol.1 Chapter 1 : King Dedede, Let's Steal The Star Rod!!
